items.sentence: A foolish impulse made me say what I should have left unsaid.
The man did not so much as apologize for stepping on my foot.
We could have our tea in the garden, were it a little warmer.
I drove around town, looking for something interesting to do.
Tom wanted me to drive, but I told him that I was too sleepy.
I still remember when I came to this town for the first time.
I still remember when I came to this city for the first time.
Tom warned me not to say anything to Mary about the incident.
Is there a place where I can charge my cellphone around here?
More than a third of the world population lives near a coast.
